document_data.caption: The coat-of-arms of the Kendrick family.
document_data.name: Kendrick
document_data.symbol: A silver [[bear]] on a black field
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite dragon/362/Grand History of the Realms: The Moonshaes}}
document_data.mainbody: The '''Kendrick''' family were nobles from [[Caer Corwell]] who served as Kings of [[Corwell]] and later High Kings and Queens of the [[Moonshae Isles]].
document_data.Notable members:
* [[Alicia Kendrick]]
* [[Bryon Kendrick]]
* [[Robyn Kendrick]]
* [[Tristan Kendrick]]
* [[Fithwyn Kendrick]], a member of the Kendrick family who did business with the [[Mystic Carrion]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
